headline: Is Snowflake Inc. (SNOW) One of the Most Promising Future Stocks to Buy Now?
summary: Snowflake Inc. (NYSE:SNOW) is one of the most promising future stocks to buy now. Bank of America Securities maintained a Buy rating on Snowflake Inc. (NYSE:SNOW) on February 6, setting a price target of $275. Rosenblatt Securities also reaffirmed a Buy rating on Snowflake Inc. (NYSE:SNOW) on February 3. In a separate development, Snowflake Inc.
